In New York City, a fire at Shion 69 Leonard Street, a wind advisory for Staten Island, and a surge in flu cases highlight urgent public health concerns, while Mayor Zohran Mamdani's inauguration and significant policy changes, including a veto of 19 bills, mark a pivotal transition in local governance.

### Risks & Alerts

- Fire at Shion on 69 Leonard Street reported; no injuries confirmed. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiekFVX3lxTE5QakRmR0c3QVctVmhFc0VVR3BUNkFqemc0dGI1bEswSmVneGdGNWE5TFY4NHVRWVhWR1hUSDdTQ2o3cnBIVVRkbWI5bDFTSS00dHQtOVhaT2V2dHpJb01IWVc1b3BlQnhzVVJRZVNxVWlLOXV3MHk4ZFl3?oc=5)
- Wind advisory in effect for Staten Island with gusts up to 50 mph; flurries possible. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Flu cases surging in NYC; residents advised to seek medical attention if symptomatic. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMikAFBVV95cUxPRllRVjdHNEQySDd4cjV4WmZhaWtaRkpXWnhQbFppUzdfRi04Y0VLZVlEeTlKT0ZMVllLYXBuVV9QZnB1dlN0djc1UHV1Q1A3bk5UNHVvQ0daS3BIQW5UcTZDb3RNV0ladDV6TTN3a3pNazJMWWRSVjY1YVp5UFpFUVh0YzhOZFZVMWFubXUweXY?oc=5)
- NYC issues advisory for upcoming snow, New Year’s cleanup, and Mamdani inauguration. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Snow expected this weekend; residents should prepare for travel disruptions. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)

### Civics & Politics

- Zohran Mamdani sworn in as the new Mayor of New York City on New Year's Day. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Mamdani reverses his stance on ending mayoral control of public schools. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Mamdani appoints a new Transportation Chief to improve bus services. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Toll and fare increases will take effect in NYC on January 4. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)

### Opportunities & Welfare

- New law gives extra civil service exam points to qualifying New Yorkers. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Mayor Adams announces $2M emergency fund for transgender and nonbinary New Yorkers. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMirAFBVV95cUxOS2t3emo0eW9uMjFlVXZRdGZFR0VSYVY5UDFsTFlkeGpyR0tjc2szS1hUWENZVGtmNmxreWRnYVMwdmJYVzVKWm5VczRNSGxzdnB1UFhvRTlSOUdhQm5MMXVwTkRVU1VFX3hXNEowM2ZxNWJqallkNWJUUVcydlNxV1dzS3d6SU9Xa1hGMi05aHBjdE9WdmN2azZTOU1pMC1KSzhjR3NEaFFna0pU?oc=5)
